mapper.insert: insert into eb_system_attachment (att_id, name, att_dir, satt_dir, att_size, att_type, pid, time, image_type, module_type, ctime) values (#{attId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sattDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attSize,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{moduleType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update eb_system_attachment set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, att_dir = #{attDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, satt_dir = #{sattDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, att_size = #{attSize,jdbcType=CHAR}, att_type = #{attType,jdbcType=CHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image_type = #{imageType,jdbcType=BIT}, module_type = #{moduleType,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where att_id = #{attId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select att_id, name, att_dir, satt_dir, att_size, att_type, pid, time, image_type, module_type, ctime from eb_system_attachment where att_id = #{attId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
